title: Pipestone National Monument: Lichens
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Lichens                Lichens         Lichen growth on quartzite rock NPS  Lichens are an important part of the prairie ecosystem at Pipestone National Monument. These plant/fungi organisms slowly break down rocks to mineral components to create a primitive soil over long periods of time. It takes a century for Lichens to spread an inch or less on rocks.
